% 304 Stainless Steel

% Graphite
mat GRPH -2.12 tmp 923 moder
grph 6000 rgb 250 250 0
6000.06c -1 %(Carbon)
therm grph 1010 gre7.00t gre7.26t
%
% Boron Carbide (10-B enriched) Absorber
mat B4C -2.52 tmp 923 rgb 110 240 80
5010.06c 0.8 %10-B
%5011.06c 0.4 %11-B
6000.06c 0.2 %(Carbon)
%
% "Air"
mat Air -0.001205 tmp 300 rgb 255 170 220
6000.50c 0.000150
7014.50c 0.784431
8016.50c 0.210748
18000.59c  0.004671
%

mat BeO -3.01 tmp 923 rgb 110 190 250
4009.06c 0.5
8016.06c 0.5
%

mat NiCrMo -8.89 tmp 956 rgb 160 160 160
